agg.name: RSS
agg.desc: A family of web feed formats used to publish frequently updated works in a standardized format.

agg.name: Atom
agg.desc: The Atom format was developed as an alternative to RSS.

agg.name: RSD
agg.desc: Really Simple Discovery (RSD) is an XML format and a publishing convention for making services exposed by blog, or other web software.

agg.name: Windows Live Writer
agg.desc: Desktop blog-publishing application that is part of the Windows Live range of products.

agg.name: FeedBurner
agg.desc: FeedBurner is a web feed management provider.

agg.name: Pingback Support
agg.desc: Pingback is a method for web authors to request notification when somebody links to one of their documents.

agg.name: Dublin Core
agg.desc: The Dublin Core Metadata Initiative provides core metadata vocabularies in support of interoperable solutions for discovering and managing resources.
